content.en: Optimizing SLM Performance: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the performance of spatial light modulators (SLMs) in various applications. For example, the SPGD algorithm is used to convert multimode beams into near-diffraction-limited flattop beams, while an optimization algorithm is used to tune the parameters of zone plate structures. These algorithms allow for the adaptive optimization of phase distributions, resulting in improved focusing properties and efficient laser shaping. Additionally, algorithms are used to analyze diffraction patterns, eliminate phase vortices, and control the transmission of light through scattering media.
content.da: Optimering af SLM-ydeevne: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere ydeevnen af rumlige lysmodulatorer (SLM'er) i forskellige applikationer. For eksempel bruges SPGD-algoritmen til at konvertere multimode stråler til næsten diffraktionsbegrænsede flattop-stråler, mens en optimeringsalgoritme bruges til at justere parametrene for zonepladestrukturer. Disse algoritmer muliggør adaptiv optimering af fasedistributioner, hvilket resulterer i forbedrede fokusseringsegenskaber og effektiv lasershapning. Derudover bruges algoritmer til at analysere diffraktionsmønstre, eliminere faserne, og kontrollere transmissionen af lys gennem spredningsmedier.
